items.content_html: Tiny React is a lightweight clone of the popular JavaScript library, React. This project aims to provide a simplified yet educational implementation of React's core concepts, focusing on the key aspects of JSX processing, rendering, efficient patching, and component lifecycle.
items.title: theyashwanthsai/TinyReact: Tiny React is a lightweight clone of the popular JavaScript library, React. This project aims to provide a simplified yet educational implementation of React's core concepts, focusing on the key aspects of JSX processing, rendering, efficient patching, and component lifecycle.

items.content_html: 🍔 UrbanBitesHub is a frontend-only web app designed for urban food enthusiasts. Explore local eateries, discover hidden gems, and share your culinary adventures visually. Lightweight, responsive, and visually stimulating – your gateway to a vibrant urban food scene!
items.title: Community-Programmer/UrbanBitesHub: 🍔 UrbanBitesHub is a frontend-only web app designed for urban food enthusiasts. Explore local eateries, discover hidden gems, and share your culinary adventures visually. Lightweight, responsive, and visually stimulating – your gateway to a vibrant urban food scene!
